description: Competition limited to EAGLE BOA holders under NAICS 561210 by the RFP close date.
proposal_evidence: Intro Section 1.1 states: 'We are an approved EAGLE BOA holder under NAICS 561210.'

description: Incumbent is KBRwyle under contract W52P1J-12-G-0061-0001.
proposal_evidence: Capture Strategy subsection discusses incumbent KBRwyle history and differentiators.
gaps: No explicit contract number in executive summary
suggestion: Add contract number in Executive Summary to show awareness.

description: Questions due 2025-10-14 1400 EST; proposals due 2025-10-28 1400 EST.
proposal_evidence: Proposal Schedule table lists both deadlines correctly.

description: Technical Volume limited to 25 pages, 11 pt font, 1 inch margins; PDF only.
proposal_evidence: Draft PDF is 27 pages including cover and TOC.
suggestion: Condense staffing narrative and remove redundant graphics to reach 25 pages.

description: Offer shall remain valid for 180 days from proposal due date.
proposal_evidence: No explicit validity statement found in Volume I.
suggestion: Insert a sentence in the transmittal letter confirming 180-day proposal validity.

description: Best Value tradeoff among Technical, Past Performance, and Cost/Price.
proposal_evidence: Executive Summary mentions best value approach aligning people, performance history, and price discipline.
suggestion: Add explicit sentence: 'We recognize Technical outweighs Past Performance; combined they outweigh Cost/Price.'

description: Technical Factor sub-factors: Staffing Approach, Maintenance Execution, Supply Chain Resilience.
proposal_evidence: Sections 3, 4, and 5 map to the three sub-factors with labeled headers.
gaps: Supply Chain section lacks resilience metric table
suggestion: Add a resilience KPI table (MTTR, parts availability %) referencing Attachment 0014 assets.

description: Government Furnished Facilities and Equipment (GFFE) provided per PWS tasks.
proposal_evidence: Maintenance Plan references GFFE qualitatively but no inventory table.
gaps: Missing crosswalk of GFFE to tasks
suggestion: Insert table mapping each GFFE item to preventive maintenance task and acceptance criteria.

description: Provide preventive maintenance for APS-4 equipment within 24 hours of notification.
proposal_evidence: Section 4.2 states 24-hour response but lacks clock start definition.
gaps: Does not define trigger event for 24-hour window
suggestion: Clarify response time starts at Government email acknowledgment; include escalation ladder.

description: CLIN 0001: Firm-Fixed-Price base operations support for a 366-day base period including 60-day transition.
proposal_evidence: Pricing Volume shows CLIN 0001 single FFP line but transition tasks listed separately in narrative.
gaps: Narrative separation may imply separate billing
suggestion: Explicitly state transition tasks are included within CLIN 0001 fixed price.

description: Key Personnel changes prohibited first 180 days without CO approval.
proposal_evidence: Key Personnel matrix lists commitments but no replacement protocol during restriction window.
gaps: Lacks contingency plan for unexpected departure
suggestion: Add rapid replacement procedure and pre-vetted alternates in Appendix.
